reviewText: This was Divya Bharti last film, I really did enjoy this movie even though it's bitter sweet knowing what happened to her,  she had so much potential but her life was cut tragically short. It's a very colorful movie,  plot of the movie is good and songs are enjoyable.  Get this movie if you want to see one her last films she completed before her tragic death.
Fantastic music from a minor hit of the 1990s, I love this film and the actors in the lead roles were both touched by tragedy in real life, very moving stories.
